Lightfoot Halfling.title: Lightfoot Halfling
Lightfoot Halfling.description: Lightfoot halflings are known for their cunning and deftness. They tend to be more outgoing and adventurous than their stouter cousins and are often found in the raucous company of bards, rogues, and other adventurers. Lightfoot halflings are also known for their talent as musicians and storytellers.

Stout Halfling.title: Stout Halfling
Stout Halfling.description: Stout halflings are known for their resilience and tenacity. They tend to be more reserved and cautious than their more outgoing cousins, but they are no less adventurous. Stout halflings are often found in the company of dwarves, as they share a love of the good life and a distaste for goblins and other monsters.

Tinkerton Gnome.title: Tinkerton Gnome
Tinkerton Gnome.description: Tinkerton gnomes are known for their inventiveness and creativity. They are native to the gnomish capitol of Tinkerton and tend towards a more solitary lifestyle than their forest cousins. They are rarely seen without a small toolbox or bag of tools. And can often be found performing a spectacular demonstration of their latest feat of engineering.

Forest Gnome.title: Forest Gnome
Forest Gnome.description: Forest gnomes are known for their love of nature and their ability to blend into the natural surroundings. They are often found in the company of druids and rangers, and they love to tell stories about the fey creatures they encounter in the wilds.

High Elf.title: High Elf
High Elf.description: High elves are known for their grace, beauty, and magical prowess. They tend to have a strong sense of superiority and disdain for those who are not elves. They are often found in the halls of non-elf elites and nobles as confidants and advisors.

Wood Elf.title: Wood Elf
Wood Elf.description: Wood elves are known for their nimble agility and inseparable connection to nature. They are often found in the role of rangers, druids, and other nature-based professions. They are rarely seen when unintended and cannot becontained without the use of magic or force for very long. If you see a wood elf, it's because they want you to see them.

Dark Elf.title: Drow
Dark Elf.description: Drow are known for their grace, beauty, and magical prowess. They are often found in the company of others, and they love to laugh and tell jokes.

Mountain Dwarf.title: Mountain Dwarf
Mountain Dwarf.description: Mountain dwarves are known for their resilience and tenacity. They are often found in the company of others, and they love to laugh and tell jokes.

Hill Dwarf.title: Hill Dwarf
Hill Dwarf.description: Hill dwarves are known for their resilience and tenacity. They are often found in the company of others, and they love to laugh and tell jokes.
